roleset.name: to provide with light, clarify, shining a light on
roleset.note: ILLUMINATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'illuminate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from illuminate.01-v predicate notes)
ILLUMINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, illuminate.01. Corresponds to VNcls illustrate-25.3. (from illumination.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The danger that Ms. Bogart seems [*-2] to be courting [*T*-1]here is one of obfuscation rather than rejuvenation , a vision so at odds with the playwright 's that the two points of view nullify , rather than illuminate , each other .

example.name: arg1
example.text: Anyway , just now went to the car and discovered that one of the external door illumination light is not working .

example.name: arg1
example.text: -LRB- Constant ILLUMINATION of materialistic things - hence the looting .
